text: was a castle structure in Tamba-Sasayama, Hyōgo Prefecture, Japan. It was the original base of power for the Hatano clan. Akechi Mitsuhide`s mother entered the castle as a hostage but later she was executed by Hatano's army in 1579. ==References== Category:Castles in Hyōgo Prefecture Category:Historic Sites of Japan Category:Former castles in Japan Category:Ruined castles in Japan Category:Akechi clan Category:Oda clan Category:1500s establishments in Japan
